text: Credit Suisse Group is a Swiss bank. It is headquartered in Zurich. The company was founded in 1856 as Schweizerische Kreditanstalt (SKA, ) jointly by Alfred Escher and the German bank Allgemeine Deutsche Credit-Anstalt which held 50% of the equity. After the bank had financial problems because the customers lost confidence, it was decided to integrate Credit Suisse into UBS. This decision was communicated on March 19, 2023. == References == Category:Financial institutions of Switzerland Category:1856 establishments in Europe
title: Credit Suisse
